subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: No Kenyan man has won four Boston Marathons, but three Kenyans have won three each. One of them is Robert Kipkoech Cheruiyot, and race officials announced that he would return April 21 for the 111th running of the race.His main challengers will include Patrick Ivuti and James Kwambai, also from Kenya. In the Chicago Marathon last October, Ivuti outleaned Jaouad Gharib of Morocco, the world champion. Kwambai finished second in Boston last year.
